org.apache.felix.ipojo.manipulation

Class ClassLoaderAwareClassWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.objectweb.asm.ClassVisitor
      • org.objectweb.asm.ClassWriter
        • org.apache.felix.ipojo.manipulation.ClassLoaderAwareClassWriter

  • public class ClassLoaderAwareClassWriter
extends org.objectweb.asm.ClassWriter
    An extension of ClassWriter that uses a specific classloader to load classes.

    • Method Detail

      • getCommonSuperClass

        protected final String getCommonSuperClass(String type1,
                                           String type2)
        Implements the common super class lookup to be a bit more permissive. First we check is type1 == type2, because in this case, the lookup is done. Then, if one of the class is Object, returns object. If both checks failed, it returns Object.
        Overrides:
        getCommonSuperClass in class org.objectweb.asm.ClassWriter
        Parameters:
        type1 - the first class
        type2 - the second class
        Returns:
        the common super class
